thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 30 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Advanced Energy Q4 Loss Per Share $0.73 From Continuing Operations

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Advanced Energy Q4 Loss Per Share $0.73 From Continuing Operations
text:
Jan 30 (Reuters) - Advanced Energy Industries Inc:
* ADVANCED ENERGY ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.31 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS
* Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.73 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * Q4 SALES $179.2 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $177.2 MILLION
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.22 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $183 MILLION - $193MLN * SEES Q1 2018 GAAP EPS FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS $1.19 - $1.29
* SEES Q1 2018 NON-GAAP EPS FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS $1.27 - $1.37
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.24, REVENUE VIEW $181.5 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
